add_sql_query(table, user, password, home, permissions)[source]

Add the names of the database columns in SQL so that they can be loaded into the system

validate_authentication(username, password, handler)[source]

Raises AuthenticationFailed if supplied username and password don’t match the stored credentials in database, else return None.
